name: Space Flex
description:
"Space Flex" is a brand new shoot 'em up arcade. Play as Alan the alien and destroy as many enemies as you can!

While playing you collect coins and different bonuses. After beating the level you can spend your coins to upgrade your ship.

The game looks easy but it is not. Good Luck!

Game Features:
  • Great Sci-Fi setting
  • 5 unique bosses
  • Many types of enemies and bonuses
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Easter eggs: collect them all!

Game Controls:
  • A/D - move
  • LMB - shoot
  • In boss fights you can do jump and doublejump (W) and make a dash (double A or D )
